c:simple-property.name: jndiName
c:simple-property.c:description: The JNDI Name under which the DataSource wrapper will be bound.

c:simple-property.name: useJavaContext
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates if the JNDI name should be prefixed with java:.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of true will be used.

c:simple-property.name: connectionUrl
c:simple-property.c:description: The JDBC driver URL string.

c:simple-property.name: datasourceClass
c:simple-property.c:description: The fully qualified name of the JDBC datasource class.

c:simple-property.name: username
c:simple-property.c:description: The default username when creating a new connection.

c:simple-property.name: password
c:simple-property.c:description: The default password when creating a new connection.

c:map-property.name: connectionProperties
c:map-property.c:description: Properties used to configure the XADataSource. Each property should be on a separate line, with the name separated from the value by an equals sign =.

c:simple-property.name: minPoolSize
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates the minimum number of connections the pool should hold.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of 0 will be used.

c:simple-property.name: maxPoolSize
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates the maximum number of connections the pool should hold.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of 20 will be used.

c:simple-property.name: jcaPoolType
c:simple-property.c:description: JBossJCA uses a ManagedConnectionPool to perform the pooling. The ManagedConnectionPool is made up of subpools depending upon the strategy chosen and other pooling parameters. Container Based means a pool per Subject, e.g. preconfigured or EJB/Web login subjects. Application Based means use the connection properties from allocateConnection. Container And Application Based means a per Subject and connection property combination. The default is just to use a single pool of equivalent connections.

c:simple-property.name: securityDomain
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates Subjects from security domain are used to distinguish connections in this pool.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default will be to use a single pool of equivalent connections.

c:simple-property.name: trackStatements
c:simple-property.c:description: Whether to check for unclosed statements when the connection is returned to the pool.
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of 'Yes, but not warnings' will be used.

c:simple-property.name: blockingTimeout
c:simple-property.c:description: Indicates the maximum time in milliseconds to block while waiting for a connection before throwing an exception. Note that this blocks only while waiting for a permit for a connection, and will never throw an exception if creating a new connection takes an inordinately long time. If nothing is specified the default of 30000 milliseconds is used.

c:simple-property.name: idleTimeout
c:simple-property.c:description: Maximum time in minutes a connection can be idle before it is closed.

c:simple-property.name: newConnectionSql
c:simple-property.c:description: SQL statement to execute whenever a new connection is added to the pool.

c:simple-property.name: validConnectionSql
c:simple-property.c:description: SQL to check the validity of a pool connection.

c:simple-property.name: connectionChecker
c:simple-property.c:description: Java class used to validate if a connection is valid.

c:simple-property.name: exceptionSorter
c:simple-property.c:description: Java class to check if an exception should be broadcast.

c:simple-property.name: prepStmtCacheSize
c:simple-property.c:description: The number of prepared statements per connection.

c:simple-property.name: sharePrepStmt
c:simple-property.c:defaultValueDescription: If nothing is specified, the default of false will be used.
